FLOWER_OFFER:
...Bury my body, stabbed w-with nail
Darkness encroaching
I wait for Light, and Light approaches
A pale, fragile vessel, o-offered to the shadow within me
GIVEN_FLOWER:
Is this what was calling to me?
Its aura quiets the v-voice...
It breaks through the light and shade.
NOT_GIVEN_FLOWER:
...It's for the best...
M-my mind...fractured...
Can't touch...too pure...
CRAZY_DREAM: C-can I take it ....DESTROY IT.... Is it offered....DON'T TOUCH IT...C-can I take it.... KILL IT....Is it offered.....DANGEROUS
GIVEN_DIALOGUE:
H-hello again, my friend! You just missed Schy, although I'm sure they're still here somewhere. It's like that with friends, isn't it?
They're always here, e-even when they're not.
Oh hello there friend! Look, your present makes a w-wonderful headlamp. Now I can always have it with me. Thank you again!
Oh h-hello, friend! See, your gift emits w-wonderful energy. Now I can always have it with me. Thank you very much!
FLOWER_OFFER_YN_RANDO: Give the flower, knowing you'll only get a lousy {0}?
